name: Raul Jimenez
bio: Raul is a software engineer passionate about JS frameworks, web technologies and cross-platform development. Since 2012 he's focused in Angular, RXJS and functional programming. Raul works at his own company as a front-end architect for companies around the world helping them to build high-performance web apps. In his spare time he's usually speaking at conferences, contributing to open source projects and playing table top games. He lives in Barcelona and is happy by default :)
